description:
This course is for students starting with tutorial making with the software Camtasia for Mac, the most important recording software for tutorials. In this course you will learn the basics of project managing with Camtasia for Mac.

You will learn how to use the various functions of the software, installing and setting it, how to record and edit video and audio, add and edit effects, texts and callouts, add clips and subtitles, create animations, set a good sound quality and finally export final videos.

To address this course of Camtasia for Mac, you'll need a computer with the Macintosh operating system, and the software Camtasia for Mac, however, we will download and install together.

Attention: Camtasia can be download and used for free -full version- for 30 days
title: Camtasia for MacOSX
